amendment.description: Page 2, lines 8 and 19, after the first dollar amount ***.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce funding (by transfer) for the Office of the Secretary Salaries and Expenses account by $6,200,000.

action.text: By unanimous consent, the Blumenauer amendment was withdrawn.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Blumenauer.
